text: Gu mbaram garav, gu harigi khesharigi bigɨna guarara garim, ana Hevenan hɨgim, gu guigira ŋgava mbatɨga muuŋgi. Gu garav, harathɨgi enseri garim, mbe kha nuianan ki gumgi gu mbigir farfarga harathɨgi bigi mbatɨgi guarira, mbe nta suigi. Mba bigi mbatɨgi, nta za vhɨzgirga, wom harigi bigɨna mbatɨk the hɨgɨrga fhu. Mba harathɨgi bigi mbatɨgi hegɨp, guigira Fhe Bakɨme ndav shirɨ vhɨzgirga.
